name: Suppression
baseDescription: Reduces the chance for enemies to resist your Affliction spells by 4%.

name: Improved Corruption
baseDescription: Reduces the casting time of your Corruption spell by 0.4 sec.

name: Improved Curse of Weakness
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your Curse of Weakness by 6%.

name: Improved Drain Soul
baseDescription: Gives you a 50% chance to get a 100% increase to your Mana regeneration for 10 sec if the target is killed by you while you drain its soul.  In addition your Mana may continue to regenerate while casting at 50% of normal.

name: Improved Life Tap
baseDescription: Increases the amount of Mana awarded by your Life Tap spell by 10%.

name: Improved Drain Life
baseDescription: Increases the Health drained by your Drain Life spell by 2%.

name: Improved Curse of Agony
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Curse of Agony by 2%.

name: Fel Concentration
baseDescription: Gives you a 14% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling the Drain Life, Drain Mana, or Drain Soul spell.

name: Amplify Curse
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your next Curse of Weakness or Curse of Agony by 50%, or your next Curse of Exhaustion by 20%.  Lasts 30 sec.

name: Grim Reach
baseDescription: Increases the range of your Affliction spells by 10%.

name: Nightfall
baseDescription: Gives your Corruption and Drain Life spells a 2% chance to cause you to enter a Shadow Trance state after damaging the opponent.  The Shadow Trance state reduces the casting time of your next Shadow Bolt spell by 100%.

name: Improved Drain Mana
baseDescription: Causes 30% of the Mana drained by your Drain Mana spell to damage the opponent.

name: Siphon Life
baseDescription: Transfers 15 health from the target to the caster every 3 sec.  Lasts 30 sec.

name: Curse of Exhaustion
baseDescription: Reduces the target's movement speed by 10% for 12 sec.  Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.

name: Improved Curse of Exhaustion
baseDescription: Increases the speed reduction of your Curse of Exhaustion by 20%.

name: Shadow Mastery
baseDescription: Increases the damage dealt or life drained by your Shadow spells by 2%.

name: Dark Pact
baseDescription: Drains 150 of your pet's Mana, returning 100% to you.
